column1: Smoque BBQ////Finally got a chance to try this place. I ordered the half-baby back ribs
column2: the pulled pork and a sampling of the sliced brisket. Thought the ribs were ok. I don't like my ribs charred nearly black at the top
column3: so it wasn't for me. The two sauces were excellent though. Loved the thinner
column5: though the thicker one was excellent
column6: too. Pulled pork - FUHMAZING. Loved that. Still tasted great the following day as leftovers. Threw it on some toast and wah-lah! Breakfast
